jobDescription: During this internship, youll be working with some of the industrys brightest minds to build tools and manage processes needed to bring a vehicle to market. Basically, youll ensure that people understand what theyre supposed to do and when theyre supposed to do it-all while they use tools you helped develop. *  Basic Qualifications*: Pursuing a Bachelors Degree in Computer Science, MIS (or equivalent field)Passion for developing real-world, practical softwareA willingness to ignore the Agile/Waterfall labels and develop processes that work for the business * Preferred Qualifications*:
